name: Ricetta: Tentazione dell'Adeptus
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Adeptus' Temptation.

value.name: Prosciutto
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Granchio
value.desc: Un crostaceo che vive accanto all'oceano. La sua deliziosa carne friabile pu√≤ essere utilizzata per preparare dei piatti appetitosi.

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Matsutake
value.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.name: Tentazione dell'Adeptus
value.desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine, in which specially selected ingredients are submerged and slowly boiled in soup stock. The recipe scribbled from memory alone was enough to urge the adepti to once again return to the world of men.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from luxurious chest located on Cloud Retainer's Floating Abode</color>
